alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 18 at 2:39AM PST until November 19 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected across the deserts and up to 60 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of southeast California. Portions of south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcyles. Secure outdoor objects.
